TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_smatu_sapat, title = smatu_sapat, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/smatu_sapat} }

S.FORM: smatu sapat gluw mlikuy hiya ga lmon samow urow kya kwara musa naha satu btiyux, gluw ina hiya ga utux utux lpgun naha ro nya aw ci cnpngan, ppsiyey hiya ga mtama luhung kya ro yaya ro yaya sa'ing mrkyas hiya ga musa mlahang gaga na sbaley, ppsiyey hiya ga stuling nya kopu ru rpusun naha 'sya, babow nya ga yaba yaya na ina ga rpus 'sya tluling naha, puting ga yaya yaya na mlikuy ga skahul kr'un naha iyik kopu tliling naha ro rpus naha 'sya uy. gluw na ina hiya ga wa magan btiyux laga ba'un maras sali naha la.

smato sapat glow mlikoy hiya ga lmon samow orow kya kwara mosa naha sato btiyox, glow ina hiya ga otox otox lpgon naha ro nya aw ci cnpngan, ppsiyey hiya ga mtama lohong kya ro yaya ro yaya sa'ing mrkyas hiya ga mosa mlahang gaga na sbaley, ppsiyey hiya ga stoling nya kopo ro rposon naha 'sya, babow nya ga yaba yaya na ina ga rpos 'sya tloling naha, poting ga yaya yaya na mlikoy ga skahol kr'on naha iyik kopo tliling naha ro rpos naha 'sya oy. glow na ina hiya ga wa magan btiyox laga ba'on maras sali naha la.
